a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Solar PV module prices vs. cumulative capacity
Solar photovoltaic (PV) module prices are measured in 2019 US$ per Watt. Cumulative installed solar PV capacity is
measured in megawatts. This represents the 'learning curve' for solar PV.
Source: Lafond et al. (2017); IRENA Database
